code: import React from"react";var Note=function Note(props){var updateTitle=function updateTitle(event){var updatedValue=event.target.value;var editId=props.note.id;props.onType(editId,"title",updatedValue);};var updateDescription=function updateDescription(event){var updatedValue=event.target.value;var editId=props.note.id;props.onType(editId,"description",updatedValue);};var clickDelete=function clickDelete(){props.deleteNote(props.note.id);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{className:"note"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",className:"note__title",value:props.note.title,onChange:updateTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("textarea",{placeholder:"Description...",className:"note__description",value:props.note.description,onChange:updateDescription}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"note__delete",onClick:clickDelete},"X"));};export default Note;
